resources.string:
410J Project 6 written by Logan Anderson 

This is an app that allows you to create and search airline and their flights. It is broken into 3 main sections which you can access by clicking the respective buttons. 

Click on "CREATE AIRLINE" to create a new airline which you can add flights to. 

Click on "CREATE FLIGHT" create and add a new flight to an existing airline. 

Click on "SEARCH" to search for flights by airline, source, and destination. 

Have fun!
